data.prayer: Father, please send teachers of your Word in Kamphaeng Phet who can speak your gospel boldly and clearly.

data.location_label: Photo from the state of Kamphaeng Phet, Thailand
data.section_summary: What needs would people have here?

data.prayer: Jesus, please bless the leaders of the the state of Kamphaeng Phet, Thailand who work hard at shepherding and guiding your people.
data.verse: With upright heart he shepherded them and guided them with his skillful hand.

data.prayer: Father, let those from the 5,900 believers who are shaken and weak remember that your love will never fail them.
data.verse: Love never fails. But where there are prophecies, they will be done away with. Where there are various languages, they will cease. Where there is knowledge, it will be done away with.

data.prayer: Spirit, make the church in Kamphaeng Phet, Thailand humble and willing to hear the sometimes hard voices of prophets bringing the light of truth on them.
data.verse: So have I become your enemy by telling you the truth?

data.prayer: Father, 0.0% are known to be believers. Please, Lord call more today.
Father, help the 5,900 believers in Kamphaeng Phet to know that you can make a big impact through their simple obedience today.
data.verse: you will be for me a kingdom of priests

data.prayer: Spirit, defend the church in the state of Kamphaeng Phet against being inward-focused.
data.verse: The Spirit of the Sovereign LORD is on me, because the LORD has anointed me to proclaim good news to the poor. He has sent me to bind up the brokenhearted, to proclaim freedom for the captives and release from darkness for the prisoners.

data.section_summary:
the state of Kamphaeng Phet, Thailand has a population of 912,500.

We estimate Kamphaeng Phet has 5,900 people who might know Jesus, 6,023 people who might know about Jesus culturally, and 900,576 people who do not know Jesus.

This is 1 believer for every 154 neighbors who need Jesus.

data.prayer: Spirit, build the strength and maturity of the local leaders in Kamphaeng Phet, Thailand. Show them that faithfulness is better than knowledge. Show them that the Spirit, the Word, and prayer is enough in order to grow and lead.
